name: FireBall
components: V,S,M (a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur)
description: A bright streak flashes to a point you choose then blossoms into an explosion of flame (8d6 fire in a 20-ft radius, DEX save for half).

name: Necrotic Rebuke
description: You lash out at your attacker's life force after being struck. The attacker must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the attacker takes 2d10 necrotic damage, or half as much on a successful one.
